SummaryEnglish: The story takes place in the Divine Era, year 300. Yuuki Yuuna lives an ordinary life as a second year middle school student, but she's also a member of the "Hero Club," where club activities involve dealing with a mysterious being called "Vertex."
Aliases: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru
Yuuki Yuuna Is a Hero: The Washio Sumi Chapter
Yuuki Yuuna Is a Hero: The Hero Chapter
Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou
Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Yuusha no Shou
Yuuki Yuuna Is a Hero: The Great Mankai Chapter
Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Dai Mankai no Shou
Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru - Churutto!
結城友奈は勇者である -鷲尾須美の章-
結城友奈は勇者である -勇者の章-

1.SummaryEnglish: Elementary school students Sumi Washio, Sonoko Nogi, and Gin Minowa are all chosen as heroes to protect the Shinju from the Vertex. Thrust into their first battle against a water-based Vertex, the girls initially struggle to attack it, but soon manage to push it back with teamwork and guts. Following their narrow victory, Sumi works up the courage to ask Sonoko and Gin to be her friends. Half a month later, after the girls beat their second Vertex, they are sent on a training camp to build their teamwork. Later, Sumi and Sonoko follow Gin as she winds up helping a lot of strangers, when the third Vertex suddenly appears. As the girls manage to work together to defeat, Sumi laments that, contrary to her own beliefs, she was the one faltering behind everyone and swears to become stronger.

2.SummaryEnglish: Given a break from their training, the girls take some time off, during which they take about their dreams and prepare a special presentation for the freshmen's orientation. Later, after returning from a school trip, the girls fight against two more Vertexes, only for Sumi and Sonoko to get heavily injured when a third one appears as well. Being the only one left able to move, Gin faces the Vertexes herself and manages to defeat them but ends up dying from her injuries, leaving Sumi and Sonoko devastated.

3.SummaryEnglish: With Gin's death weighing heavily on their minds, Sumi and Sonoko are forced to fight another Vertex in the middle of Gin's funeral. Wanting to cheer Sonoko up, Sumi invites her to a festival where they reaffirm their friendship. Later, Sumi and Sonoko receive fairy partners as part of a new hero system, the details of which are only told to their parents. Dragged into another battle gainst three more Vertexes, the girls take advantage of their new abilities and use the power of Mankai to defeat two of them. However, Sumi then discovers she has lost the use of her legs while Sonoko has gone blind in one eye. Despite concern over these inflictions, the girls continue to use Mankai to stop the remaining Vertex from attacking the bridge. After managing to destroy the Vertex's main body, Sonoko follows its core through a barrier, where she witnesses the previously defeated Vertex being resurrected. Sonoko further discovers that her heart has stopped beating but is somehow still alive, while Sumi no longer possesses any memory of her as a result of her second Mankai. Realising that she is no longer capable of dying, Sonoko undergoes Mankai countless more times to protect Sumi from the ressurecting Vertex. Some time later, Sumi, now going under her original name of Mimori Togo, moves into a new home and is befriended by her new neighbor, Yuna Yuki.

4.TitleEnglish: Yuuki Yuuna is a Hero Club Member 1

5.TitleEnglish: Yuuki Yuuna is a Hero Club Member 2

6.TitleEnglish: Yuuki Yuuna is a Hero Club Member 3

7.SummaryEnglish: Tougou Mimori looks back on the days since she entered the Sanshuu Middle School, the day she became a hero and faced the Vertex with her friends, and the day she was troubled by the risk of Mankai. That's a memory of a pure and fleeting flower.

8.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 1: A Story That Starts With a Slurp
8.SummaryEnglish: A group of pure young girls gathers from various eras at the club room of the Hero Club in Sanshuu Middle School in Kagawa with a duty to protect the peace. One day, the club president, Fuu, told them that they will come together to make a special udon.

9.SummaryEnglish: In order to set an example for everyone, the original Hero Club started making a trial udon. Since there are two members who are good at cooking, they were laughing at the easy idea that they would be able to complete the "Hero Club Udon" today, but then the.... incident happened.

10.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 3: That Hand Is the God Hand.
10.SummaryEnglish: The three Yuunas worked hard to make udon noodles. However, perhaps they put too much effort into it, and the dough turned out to be harder than expected. With their motto of "act quickly, don't think", the three Yuunas get out of the jam by using the only means available to them

11.SummaryEnglish: Wakaba and Tamako were feeling like udon after entering the hot springs. What is Udon? While Wakaba is searching for the direction of Hero Club Udon, Tamako is doing the opposite. That is because there are tall mountains in front of her eyes!

12.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 5: Do Heroes Dream of Udon?
12.SummaryEnglish: A sleepover party for the younger group, consisting of elementary school students and junior high school students. The topic of discussion was how to make the best udon. They discuss various opinions such as what should be tasty, what should look good, etc., and finally complete the best udon ......?

13.SummaryEnglish: In the Divine Era, when Shikoku became the world, udon is the staple food and the national dish. However, among the Heroes summoned from all over Japan in the past, there were definitely those who favored soba and ramen. There is no way that this will not cause conflict.

14.SummaryEnglish: Kusunoki Mebuki, the commander of the Sentinels, does not have great cooking skills. However, with the help of her friends, she realises that there is something that only she can do. She must be a great member of the Hero Club!

15.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 8: Udon Dwells In Faithful Hearts
15.SummaryEnglish: There are Mikos who belong to the Hero Club. They, too, have been struggling with the development of udon for the Hero Club. Using their ability to obtain oracles from Shinju-sama, the god of this world, they try to come up with a supreme udon, but then a helper intervenes.

16.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 9: The World Beyond the Warmth
16.SummaryEnglish: In the Hero Club where all the innocent girls are gathered, there is a Hero, Koori Chikage, who is aware of her own distortion. The only thing that saved her from being distorted by her harsh upbringing was a simple call and a pair of straight eyes. That's all it took.

17.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 10: What Is It That You Dropped?
17.SummaryEnglish: A member of the Hero Club accidentally drops "something" into the spring. What they have in common leads to a fantastic chaos. It is a fairy tale, a violence, and a mysterious event full of mysteries.

18.TitleEnglish: Churutto! 11: The Justice of Udon Lies Within Me
18.SummaryEnglish: Which udon dish tastes better: a simple one or a fancy one?

19.SummaryEnglish: It's difficult to choose an official udon dish when there are so many ideas! How will the Hero Club decide?

1.SummaryEnglish: Yuna Yuki, a second year student at Sanshu Junior High School, is a 13 year old girl living a normal, ordinary life. The only difference is that she belongs to her school's Brave Hero Club.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yuna Yuki was living a normal, ordinary life until certain circumstances drove her to transform into a hero.

3.SummaryEnglish: After a month since Yuna and her friends were chosen as heroes, they are living very busy days.

4.SummaryEnglish: Hero Club member Inubozaki Itsuki's class has a singing test coming up.

5.SummaryEnglish: The battles with the Vertexes becomes even more intense, but the Hero Club, with its ever-strengthening bond, holds them off.

6.SummaryEnglish: Yuna has renewed determination for tomorrow.

7.SummaryEnglish: By order of the Taisha, Yuna and the rest of the Hero Club head to the beach.

8.SummaryEnglish: Life in the Hero Club is as frantic as ever.

9.SummaryEnglish: One of the Heroes receives a message.

10.SummaryEnglish: Something shocking happens to the Hero Club.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Hero Club members bare their souls.

1.SummaryEnglish: Divine Era 298, two years before "Yuuki Yuuna's Chapter ." Washio Sumi who was chosen by the Shinju-sama, is a hero who protects the world alongside her classmates, Nogi Sonoko and Minowa Gin. It seems like Sonoko and Gin are trouble-makers because they could be idiotic or too energetic. Sumi is excited that she should lead the other two, but...

2.SummaryEnglish: The WaSuYus haven't been able to unify because they haven't had much time to prepare. So, they decided to choose a leader and strengthen their unity by doing a training camp. Sumi saw herself as the leader, but Aki-sensei appointed Sonoko as the leader...

3.SummaryEnglish: The WaSuYus now have stronger unity, are working hard to fulfill their roles as heroes. It's part of their job to rest as well. Three of them started to fully enjoy their momentary break.

4.SummaryEnglish: The WaSuYus are going to their elementary school's class trip. The three of them are put in a crisis because of the Vertex's advanced action whom appeared as if to shatter their fun daily life.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Hero's system advances to prepare for the battle with the escalating enemy. However, that was too brutal for the girls in 6th grade to have to bear. Nevertheless, the girls work hard to fulfill their roles.

6.SummaryEnglish: Finally, the climactic battle has begun. The heroes are fulfilling their roles with full of new powers. The flowers bloomed beautifully. What kind of destiny would await them in the future...

7.SummaryEnglish: Following their battle against the Vertex, YUuna, Fuu, Itsuki, and Karin are joined by a fully recovered Sonoko as the Hero Club resumes its normal activities. However, Yuuna starts to get a strange feeling that someone is missing from the equation. The next day, upon experiencing more deja vu, both Yuuna and Sonoko come to the realization that someone has altered their memories to make them forget all about Tougou, as if she never existed. Upon recalling their true memories of Tougou, who had been taking up a masked hero persona to make up for her sins, the girls are left with the question of where she has disappeared to.

8.SummaryEnglish: Yuuna and the Hero Club work very hard.

9.TitleEnglish: My Heart Aches When I Think of You
9.SummaryEnglish: Something surprising happens to the Hero Club again.

10.SummaryEnglish: There was something written in a certain diary.

11.SummaryEnglish: Yuuki Yuuna makes a major life decision.

12.TitleEnglish: I Am Happy for You Are With Me
12.SummaryEnglish: Heroes' screams echoed out into the heavens.

1.SummaryEnglish: The members of the Hero Club look forward to resuming their normal lives. And that means fun activities like band practice, karaoke, airsoft matches and camping trips!

2.SummaryEnglish: Back in Divine Era Year 298, Taisha gathers a group of candidates. One of them will become the next hero, and Mebuki will ensure that it will be her.

3.SummaryEnglish: The Sentinels have a dangerous task. Although Mebuki’s leadership has prevented fatalities, not everyone stays. Those who leave are replaced as if they were nothing but tools.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Sentinels do not have the powers of a hero, but they have each other. When the Vertex unexpectedly attack, Mebuki and her team face a battle unlike anything before.

5.SummaryEnglish: Sonoko’s family possessed The Hero Records for generations. When she entrusts it to the Hero Club, they learn about the first heroes who defended humanity against the Vertex.

6.SummaryEnglish: People are cruel, a fact Chikage is all too well aware of.

7.SummaryEnglish: Two friends with different perspectives arrive at a crossroads, and conflict is inevitable. And when conflict occurs, consequences follow.

8.SummaryEnglish: What does it mean to be a hero? Wakaba and Yuuna are about to find out.

9.SummaryEnglish: Karin rages against the gods who cursed Yuuna, but they don’t answer when she issues a challenge from beyond the barrier. Instead, she finds the Sentinels and an old rival.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Heroes begin their final mission, but they weren’t the only ones fighting that day. While they battled the enemy, the Sentinels were holding the line.

11.SummaryEnglish: Tougou will do anything to save Yuuna, even if it means defying the will of the gods.

12.SummaryEnglish: The battle is over at long last. Now, the Hero Club must ask what comes next.
